Item.Name: GORGEOUS SZ S VICTORIA'S SECRET CHEMISE NWOT
Item.Description: TALKA-ABOUT GIRLIE! This chemise (short slip that the French love) is oooooh so feminine. It's got it all--right from the shimmer and gloss to the lace to the satiny feel to the sexy little spaghetti straps -- and more flowers than a bloomin' garden! And it's a small - for that delicate charming one who will finally own this! Today's small is about a 33/34 bust. You know that Victoria's Secret really knows how to enhance you--so beguiling. And look at this leg area treatment (both sides) with the lace that matches above bodice lace.... ....and what was I saying about a blooming garden. As the English say, you'll be "a bit of all right" wearing this one... Colors are pink, raspberry, teal, Persian blue, wine, vanilla cream, white (the lace)rainbow gold--and all with an icy frost look to fabric but meant for a "warm" gurl. This chemise/slip can be worn under something so you'll feel sexy all day or wear it as a fetching number to sleep in. Personally, I'd be standing too long in front of the mirror if I owned it. You just have to admire yourself and your good taste when you obtain such a beauty. Remember, only one of you gets this. It's new but without tags and has been kept smoke-free, as all my things are. I shop the small and large towns of Southern California to find things I love and hope you will too. I just can't pass by anything floral without it going in my basket. S/H $3.50 Priority Mail. I accept money orders, cashier checks, and PayPal (Visa/MasterCard through PayPal only)--and I will accept personal checks if you have excellent feedback. Don't hesitate to email with questions important to you. I don't always re-list my items, but when I do, I have to increase the cost for my time--so bid early and this time around to save money. This would be so much more at the boutiques. If not for you, great for gift giving and there's still time for the holidays.

Item.Description: If the picture below is not visible, scroll to the bottom of the page for another view. Teacher Tonal Pattern Silk Tie Standard length, 4" wide New 100% Silk Made in the USA Made by Ralph Marlin All of our ties are shipped protected in plastic bags inside a shipping box that we have made exclusively for us. Shipping is $2.35 in the USA, $2.75 to Canada The shipping charge to buyers outside the USA and Canada is $6. No extra charge for multiple tie purchases paid for and shipped together. We treat you right! Please check our feedback! USA and Canada only Shipping is FREE on tie orders totaling $24.98 or more when paid for and shipped together. Have you shopped our eBay store? Over 500 styles of ties now in stock plus many more great items! Click here to visit! Your item is packed securely and shipped via USPS in most cases. You have the option of purchasing insurance if you desire it.Standard USPS rates (as of January 2001)are $1.10 up to $50, $2.00 from $50.01 to $100. Sorry, but we cannot be responsible for lost or damaged packages once they leave our possession unless they have been insured. You will not be disappointed! If for any reason you are not happy with your purchase, return it to us within ten days for a refund of your purchase price. Sorry, we do not refund shipping amounts. After The Sale We will usually contact you within 24 hours or less of the sale with payment information. Payment is expected to reach us within 10 days after the sale. We do leave feedback for our buyers on all transactions. Buyers outside the USA are responsible for all customs charges which may be incurred as a result of your merchandise purchase. Illinois buyers will need to add 7.25% sales tax. Payment Information We will be happy to accept your personal check and ship at once on any purchase up to $30 up to $75 if your feedback rating is at least 25 Checks should be imprinted with your address information. For purchases outside these parameters we accept money orders, bank checks and credit card payments via PayPal BidPay Billpoint PayPal payments should be sent to Mike@greattie.com Payment is to be made in US Dollars only on all items. HOLIDAY SHIPPING OPTIONS FOR THE USA We ship almost everything using the US Post Office. If the shipping charge stated is less than $3.50, the item is shipped via first class mail which is normally 2 to 4 days to anywhere in the USA. There is no delivery confirmation available on this and packages in rare instances have taken up to two weeks to arrive (way less than 1% of the time). Past history in shipping tells us that the Post Office actually does a very good job in December, yet with the volume of mail they process, packages do sometimes get misrouted. All items with a stated shipping charge of $3.50 or more are already shipped via priority mail, most with a delivery confirmation. Priority mail shipping with a delivery confirmation number sent to you is available on any item we sell where the shipping charge is stated at under $3.50. The cost for this is $4 and applies to the ties and most of the small ornaments that we are selling. If you want this service just submit $4 in place of any lower shipping amount stated and we will ship priority mail. Express mail overnight shipping is also available at a cost of $13.00 up to 8 ounces (single ties), 8 ounces to 2 pounds at $17 (most plates) and 2 to 3 pounds, $20. This is guaranteed overnight to most of the USA but may take two days to more rural areas. If you want to use this service have your payment in by noon CST or call me at 847-924-8744 and I will let you know if I will be able to get the item out that day. Any questions, feel free to call me at the number above. Please click here to see all of our auctions. This listing created by eBay Seller's Assistant Pro Visit Seasons2000 today! Return - Exchange information: If you are not satisfied with the item, you may return it for a refund or an exchange. In either case, you pay the return postage and we do not refund the original S&H charge. For returns, you will be credited the closing price for the item returned. For exchanges, you will be credited for the closing price for the item returned. This is be applied to the item sent in exchange and you will be charged for the shipping of the item sent in exchange. The item must be received in its packaging and in original condition. All returns and exchanges must be pre-approved. Shipping and Handling Charges: If this is the only eBay item you are purchasing from us, then the shipping and handling charge is: $8 if you are located in the lower 48 states. This is for standard ground UPS service with package tracking. $10 if you are located in Alaska, Hawaii, P.R. or have an APO. This is for USPS priority mail service with delivery confirmation. If you are purchasing multiple eBay items from us, the items can be combined into one shipment. To have us combine the items into one shipment, you must submit a SINGLE payment for all items. In cases of a multiple item purchase, then the following shipping and handling rates will apply: Orders totaling $0 to $50 incur a $6 charge Orders totaling $50.01 to $100 incur a $10 charge Orders totaling $100 to $149.99 incur a $12 charge Orders totaling $150 or more incur a $15 charge and will be sent with adult signature required. These rates are applicable only to those in the lower 48 states and is for standard ground UPS with ground tracking. This applies to purchases made within a five business day time frame. This is not applicable to tires, snowmobile tracks and other items not listing this shipping schedule. Those in Alaska, Hawaii, P.R. or who have an APO, will need to contact us for a rate quote via USPS. We ship UPS every business day. For additional costs we can ship: UPS next day air, 2nd day air, 3 day select. These rates are much higher than standard ground UPS. We do NOT ship outside the US and its possesions. New York residents should note We are required by law to charge New York Residents state sales tax. If you are a New York resident, you will need to send an email indicating your countys sales tax rate. Check Out - Post Purchase Procedure Once the listing closes with either a successful bid or through the use of the buy it now function, we will issue an email within 24 business hours detailing how to complete the purchase. New York residents will need to send an email indicating their countys sales tax rate. Those purchasing multiple items should send an email indicating all the item numbers and request the combined total. If you do not receive our email, that means your mail server is either down or has treated our email as spam. In these cases send an email indicating the item number and ask for your end of auction email. Send the email to, email@beldenmotosport.com The forms of payments we accept are PayPal Our PayPal id is, email@beldenmotosport.com We prefer to ship to your confirmed PayPal address. You need at least five or more + feedbacks for us to consider shipping to an alternative address. VISA, MasterCard, Discover, American Express and most debit cards. Item.Name: HERMES Authentic Vintage Green Leather Belt
Item.Description: This lovely belt and others (see my other auctions!) are on consignment with me just in time for the holiday season! They all come from a fabulous non smokers home. This auction is for an Authentic Vintage Hermes belt. I do not know the style or the date of this belt. However, the two Hermes bags (from the same client) I just sold are from the 1960's, therefore I am assuming this is from then as well. The belt is a wonderful dark green and is in very good condition. ( Another Hermes belt I have from this client came with an OLD price and size tag from Bonwit Teller. The original price - back in the 60's? - was $60 and it says it is a 28 INS size.) I did some rough measurements as well: it measures a hefty 2 inches wide and 32 inches long from tip to tip, although the belt is curved for a nice fit. I also tried to measure from the "loosest" hole to the clasp and it seemed to measure approx 31 inches, but it is very hard to tell since it's curved. It does have 6 holes for adjustability and the clasp is a kind of C shaped hook. Inside the belt there is a loop to tuck the end into when it's on. This belt does appear to have some very slight cracks in the green leather at the edges - possibly it is a bit dry? They are only barely noticible - they do not detract at all. Inside it is marked in various places - by the hook: Made in France; and in the center: Bonwit Teller Hermes Paris. I could not find a marking on the clasp. The belt comes in its original Hermes orange box. The box measures approx 7" x 7" x 2 1/2". Overall it is in very good condition with only minor wear on the corners. Also someone wrote "green" inside the lid in pen. There is no dust bag for this item. This is an absolutly fabulous find, a true vintage Hermes in such mint condition. It looks as if was hardly ever used. This is a lovely belt in exellent condition - you basically couldn't ask from more from a vintage Hermes belt! As this is such a rare find I have put a reserve on it to protect my client(but it not much more than the original price!). If you would like more info or photos please email me and I'll do what I can. Don't forget the holidays are getting closer - this would make an unforgettable gift!!! High bidder will pay all costs of packing, shipping and insurance. All money must be in US currency. Personal (& business) checks will be held at least two weeks before the item is shipped (no exceptions!). Send a money order or cashier's check for faster shipping!! I will also accept Biday and Paypal for this auction. Payment must be received within 10 days of the end of the auction or risk losing the right to buy and negative feedback. High bidders in the state of NJ must add on the 6% state sales tax. Please email me with any questions & good luck bidding!!

Item.Name: Brand New~Tommy Hilfiger Clogs Shoes Sandals~
Item.Description: BRAND NEW - 2001 Tommy Hilfiger Clogs Photo does not do these great clogs justice at all! They are soft and shiny black, not dull as pics show. I bought this last month on ebay and never wore them because they are big for me, even with socks, my heels slide off the clogs (which have a short heel support which is very nice). Description says 7 1/2, it might be a little bigger than that as I wear 7 to 7 1/2. I just want to get some money back. Here is the seller's description, which is very accurate - except the box says USA 8M (8 was crossed and 7 1/2 was penned in), UK 5 1/2 M. EUR 39M. What I have for you is a brand new, never before used pair of 2001 Tommy Hilfiger clogs size 7 1/2M. Guaranteed authentic and brand new still in the box, with tissue and all! Ever in a hurry? These black clogs are great and a must for the person on the go. They are made of genuine buttery soft leather. The inside is cushioned so these clogs are extremely comfortable! The sole of these shoes are skid resistant, awesome! They will go great with your dresses, jeans or slacks. These clogs can be used for shopping or anywhere you plan to do alot of walking. They are definitely an eye catcher. I guarantee your friends will adore them and so will you. I purchased them last month while on vacation and never wore them. Enough of me raving about them, you be the judge, look at the pictures. They can be yours today for a fraction of the price. These clogs were purchased at Carson Pirie Scott in downtown Chicago for much more. At these prices you can have shoes in every color for every outfit. I took several pics so you can see how nice these are - wish they really fit me! Good luck and thank you for looking! Free Honesty Counters powered by Andale! Visit Wigs of Juvilee today! Item.Name: Celtic Unicorn t-shirt NEW! XL-Sapphire Blue
Item.Description: This t-shirt is 100 % cotton, pre-shrunk, double-stitched on the seams. The size is a generously-cut XL, the shirt colour is Sapphire Blue. The shirt is BRAND-NEW and never worn, bagged in plastic with all the original tags. The magnificent Celtic unicorn is a creature of the moon - wise, graceful and beautiful. The Unicorn represents purity, chastity and gentleness, and was a common subject for medieval tapestries and decorative art. They are noble, solitary and intelligent and act as protectors and guardians for other woodland beasts.However, they become savage and fierce fighters when threatened. Their horn was a magical cure for all illness and so they were often hunted for their horns. Today, they represent power,inner beauty, gentleness and a love for all creatures. After 4 years of travelling to Celtic festivals, we're tired and want to stay home and get a life :) Therefore we're selling our entire regular inventory at great discount prices! I accept PayPal, BidPay, all INTERNATIONAL money orders, well-hidden cash. If your positive feedback is 50 OR MORE, I will acept a personal cheque. If you're in Europe, I am only able to accept BidPay, PayPal or well-hidden cash :) Shipping anywhere in Canada or the U.S. is $2.60 by Surface or $3.60 by Airmail. Please see my other Celtic tee auctions - thanks for looking!

Item.Description: Gorilla Soldier Special Collector Edition figure from "Planet Of The Apes". This authentic action figure, based on the classic sci-fi movie, is the first Gorilla Soldier action figure produced since the Mego figures of the 1970's. Fully articulated 12-inch Gorilla Soldier figure comes dressed in authentic unifrom, and is equipped with backpack, bandolier, and rifle. Includes rotating display stand also. Comes packaged in cylindrical display tune. Dr. Zira Catapulted 2000 years into time and space, a team of American astronauts crash lands on an unknown planet dominated by a strange but intelligent simian population. From the Hasbro Signature Series comes this Special Collector Edition figure from "Planet of the Apes." Dr. Zira is a chimpanzee psychologist who believes that apes descended from a lower primate form - possibly human. Her interest in behavioral patterns leads her to befriend the captured astronaut and later helps him to escape the deadly fate that awaits him on the ape planet. Fully articulated 12" Dr. Zira figure comes dressed in authentic costume and equipped with notebook and pencil. Plus, includes a rotating display stand. Package Dimensions (in inches): 14" x 5" x 4.8" Captain Taylor Catapulted 2000 years into time and space, a team of American astronauts crash lands on an unknown planet dominated by a strange but intelligent simian population. From the Hasbro Signature Series comes this Special Collector Edition figure from "Planet of the Apes." Commander George Taylor, the captured leader of the space exploration team desperately tries to prove that he is intelligent, communicative and peaceful, not the primitive, menacing, killing creature the apes regard man to be. His display of human superiority confirms the role of humans in ape evolution, revealing the secret of simian society. Fully articulated 12" Captain Taylor figure comes dressed in authentic space outfit and equipped with backpack and gun. Plus, includes a rotating display stand. Sign up today. It's FREE, FAST, and get paid $5.00 to do it! What a deal! That about covers the shipping cost for this item! Please visit our many other auctions BID WITH CONFIDENCE! 2,000+ Positive Feedbacks! If this is your first time bidding with us, please read our FAQ Page. If you cannot comply with the terms of the auction, please do not bid. FAQ HOW CAN YOU SELL SO CHEAP? WHERE DO YOU GET THE STUFF? We specialize in the remarketing of New, Used, and Distressed Merchandise. These items are from overstock warehouses, company liquidations, freight claims, bulk auctions, and insurance purchases. This means that some items may be missing manuals, cords, cables, disks, factory packaging and/or may have light to severe damage. Please read the ENTIRE auction and ask ALL questions prior to bidding. We suggest you call or visit the manufacturer's page for detailed information. Items may have come originally with accessories such as remotes, cables, or batteries. If it's not listed in the description, don't expect it. WHAT DO YOU MEAN BY "UNTESTED" AND "AS-IS"? Please understand that our warehouse does not have the equipment, facilities, or time to fully test every item. We offer a "cursory" inspection on all items and list our findings in the auction description. We supply all available Make/Model information for you to review and research. Please do your own research prior to bidding. All items and contents are described to the best of our ability. Unless the auction description states differently, these items are sold and "as-is". We reserve the right to refuse sale or service for any reason. WHEN SHOULD I SEND PAYMENT? Payment is due within 10 days of the closing of the auction. Otherwise, we reserve the right to re-post or re-sell this item and request credit from eBay, at our discretion. Acceptable forms of payment include Cashier Checks, Money Orders, and Bank Wire Transfers. If necessary, we can accept personal or company checks. We normally ship within 3-5 business days for certified funds. We hold all checks for 7-10 working days for validation. We do not use I-Escrow or any other escrow company. Other payment terms may be available and will be disclosed in our "Payment Email" that will be sent to you at the end of the auction. Unless otherwise stated, Sales are final. All others we offer a 50% restocking fee for any returns, less shipping and paypal fees (if applicable). I WON MORE THAN ONE ITEM OR I AM BIDDING ON MORE OF YOUR AUCTIONS. SHOULD I WAIT AND SEND PAYMENTS ALL AT ONCE? I MAY SAVE A BUCK OR TWO? Although we appreciate you bidding on more of our items, it would be more efficient if you sent in each payment as the item closes. We use an automated system and it sends out confirmations, feedbacks, Non-Pay Bidder Reminders, and other eBay related operations automatically. That's why it's so important to get payment in within 10 days of the close of the auction and keep auctions as separate transactions. If you delay, you may get warnings from eBay or you may actually lose your item because it got re-posted. We also do not combine shipping fees because we ship from various warehouses and cannot guarantee that items will be shipped together. Also, it requires us to manually do each multiple order and that interferes with our automated system. Therfore, we do not combine shipping fees. If you get multiple items shipped together, it's just a matter of luck and chance. HOW DO YOU SHIP WITH AND WHAT IF I'M OUTSIDE YOUR STANDARD SHIPPING AREA? We ship via UPS Ground from Connecticut, 06804. For books, videos, CDs video games and other media we may offer Media Mail Rates. If available, it would be listed in the auction description. We cannot ship to PO BOXES or Military APO addresses. If you are outside the 48 contiguous US states, shipping fees are more. Please contact us for the estimated rates prior to bidding. PAYPAL USERS: We can ONLY ship to verified Paypal addresses. If you want it shipped to a different address send your payment via the mail. Whenever possible, we will provide shipping weights and/or fixed shipping costs. Fixed shipping rates are for shipping within the 48 contiguous states. If you are outside of this area, contact us prior to bidding. Shipping will be higher. Sorry, we do not combine shipping fees. It screws up our automated accounting and shipping programs. HOW WILL I KNOW WHEN YOU RECEIVE MY PAYMENT OR WHEN MY ITEM IS SHIPPED? We issue the buyer a Positive Feedback the day your payment is received and entered. You can use this as a reference of when your item will be shipped. If you provide us an email, we will email you a tracking number. All shipping questions should be directed to shipping@highendequipment.com. We are no longer responsible for items once it is picked up by the courier. If damage occurs during transit, we will assist in the claims process. No product refunds will be issued until the claim is paid. Shipping fees are not refundable for any reason. ANYTHING ELSE BEFORE I BID? Please read all the information on the auction and do your research prior to bidding. If you have any questions, please call our office at 203-740-9111 or email us at inquiry@highendequipment.com. By placing a bid on this auction you are confirming that you have read all the information, asked all your questions, and understand the terms of this auction. NICE FEEDBACK RATING, BUT WHY DO YOU HAVE SO MANY NEGATIVES? The fact of the matter is, we are only human. We do make mistakes. We also use automated systems and internet based platforms to help automate the selling process. We can fix our human errors, unfortunately the others are not as easy. We can't fix external programs like eBay or AuctionWatch. Most problems can be resolved with one phone call. We try our best to service all customers and when we make a mistake, we take care of it. Not every buyer gives us the opportunity to correct for our mistakes. Most of our negatives are from new users who don't understand or respect the rules of eBay. They don't read the auctions and are not very good shoppers. If a problem comes up, they SLAM a Negative Feedback and not even give us a chance to address the issue. Basically, when we are given the opportunity, we take care of everybody. Hey, you can't be an eBay PowerSeller without doing something right! MAN, WHY DON'T YOU GUYS RETURN EMAILS FASTER? Everyone in our company travels frequently to find the best deals to bring to you on eBay. Therefore, it is difficult for us to return emails in a timely manner. If all else fails, call our office for assistance. 203-740-9111. Office hours are Mon-Fri 9am-5pm EST. We strive to bring you the best items at the very best prices possible!
